description: This file defines a React functional component 'RecipeCard' that renders a preview card for a recipe, displaying an image, name, description, tags, cook time, servings, difficulty, and price. It uses Next.js Link component for navigation and references a Recipe type for props.

methods.name: RecipeCard
methods.description: A React functional component that displays a recipe preview card with image, title, description, tags, and additional details.
